<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The FDRTraceWriter allows us to hand-craft an XRay Flight Data Recorder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (FDR) mode log file. This is used primarily for testing, generating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sequences of FDR records that can be read/processed. It can also be used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// generate various kinds of execution traces without using the XRay runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this writer does not do any validation, but uses the types of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// records defined in the FDRRecords.h file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/fdrtracewriter"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/fdrtracewriter/#ac7333c2977ef0c36d662ef9cff756703">FDRTraceWriter</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/recordvisitor">RecordVisitor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
